website_summaries.verdict: A premium designer paper in matte pastel colors with bold gold stripes.
pros: Create eye-catching packages with this thick, durable paper
The designs are coordinated to work together for a classy presentation
cons: There's not as much product on the roll as other options

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but See Through
customer_reviews.text: The paper is beautiful, but it's... well, it's see through. It's literally so thin that you can see through to the gift beneath. I wrapped a couple of books and you could clearly see the title of the books, and the back description, through the paper. It was obscured a bit, don't get me wrong, but I shouldn't be able to see something like that through wrapping paper which is supposed to hide and cover your gift so it's a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Pierce

customer_reviews.title: All my friends ended up buying this wrapping too!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this product exceed my expectations as far as quality, design and vibrant color, but I fell in love with the entire line. The product comes with a message about their customer satisfaction being the most important, and believe me, they mean it.
customer_reviews.author: Life's Looking Good

customer_reviews.title: I love these gift wraps!
customer_reviews.text: I was going back and forth in deciding whether to get them because I so loved the colors and styles but wasn't sure if I wanted to buy three and pay that money right now. I am so glad I finally decided to get them because after visiting several pharmacies looking for gift wrapping paper, I realized these are not expensive, and imagine my excitement when I also realized that they are of superior quality, as well! So totally worth it, beautiful, value for money, and quality! Will be definitely getting my wrapping paper through here again!
customer_reviews.author: XS

customer_reviews.title: Unique, beautiful, and high quality wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: The three designs used together make quite a nice presentation. The teal design is rich and beautiful and my favorite. The paper is very thick, though, and may not be the best for wrapping soft sided items. I didn't notice if there is companion ribbon, but coordinating ribbon would be a plus. I had a little trouble finding a good ribbon match for the peach design. Bottom line, very pleased with my purchased, and the person who received the wrapped gifts, raved about the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: This paper is lovely. The colors are vibrant, the paper is heavy, and the matte finish gives it a great richness. Perhaps I have been spoiled by having grids as guidelines inside wrapping paper, but I can't remember the last time i saw paper that didn't have that. This does not. It doesn't seem like a big deal, but it is helpful, especially when trying to get your fourteen year-old son to help when he would rather be doing anything but. It is also versatile enough to work for multiple occasions, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Figlet

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, but very see-through
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for wrapping a bridal shower gift and gots lots of compliments on the color and feel of the paper. Unfortunately, I had to double wrap everything because any label/writing/etc showed through clearly, so if you buy this just be aware you’ll be using twice as much as you think you need if you don’t want the receiver to see wha they are getting through the wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.author: arc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, high quality wrapping paper. It’s thicker than the run-of-the-mill wrapping paper, so it’s best to take your time when wrapping with it. I was able to neatly wrap presents with it and am still not sure I am going to allow the recipient to destroy the paper by opening the gift. They may just have to settle with a photo of what’s inside!
customer_reviews.author: Sharri Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly packaged!
customer_reviews.text: Slightly strange to say... But this is probably the best wrapping paper I have ever bought! It was packaged really cute almost made me wanted to give it as a gift! It was easy to wrap gifts with and the colors are exactly as pictured. I like Matte paper but some don’t so I feel like it’s important to note that the paper besides the shimmer is Matte opposed to a shiny finish!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Seethrough wrapping paper unfortunately, but feels and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: The paper looks great and feels great, I really loved it when it arrived. However, it is seethrough, I had to double wrap all packages. I thought this wrapping paper would be premium and a single wrap would be enough. It is not, you can see the gift under in the clear parts of the wrapping paper. Beside this, it is really beautiful, I like the matte feel of the paper. Just make sure to wrap it first in a white paper, or add 2 layer of this one, otherwise the gift will show through.
customer_reviews.author: JEL

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and multi-purpose
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and how pretty it is. It's multi-purpose without being utilitarian. It's proven great for wedding, birthday, baby shower, and holiday gifts. It makes your 🎁 look good whether it's on the present while sitting on the gift table or torn to shreds/confetti while the recipient squeals happily at your perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: WINNER
customer_reviews.text: Love it, a steady hand makes a beating package, I read review about paper smudging—most thick matte wrapping paper especially ones with this kind of foil will stain from oils, lotion etc. so wash dry hands before use, I had no problems, hands have natural oils some more then others.
customer_reviews.author: LILLY

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have said, it has a "matte" finish that can be marked up by fingerprints etc. Other than that it is very high quality, thick paper, nice looking wrapping paper. It looks like expensive paper.
customer_reviews.author: Rowena

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a wrapping paper snob. I will only buy paper from one store. In a hurry, I reluctantly purchased this wrapping paper and I LOVE IT. It is thick and durable yet light enough to tape. The designs are so classy and attractive. I am so happy to find wrapping paper online that I love as I also love not driving across town. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me who loves nice wrapped presents but hate wrapping this is the paper for you. The high quality insures nice folds and creates a nice and sturdy wrap on gifts for sure
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but not opaque
customer_reviews.text: The whole point of wrapping paper is to conceal what’s inside but the white parts are see through. Makes the roll with white on it useless. I love the design though.
customer_reviews.author: michelle s

customer_reviews.title: Cute but can be too thick
customer_reviews.text: The wrapping paper is SO cute but unfortunately feels awkward when wrapping due to how thick it is. Also, it picks up ANY sort of dirt or grease very easily and the spots are very obvious due to the design, so you have to be very careful where you wrap/place the gifts. Overall I would say cute, good for wrapping certain kinds of items, but has a lot of drawnbacks
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Bickley

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous paper - works best on big packages to get full affect.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous paper - works best on big packages to get full affect. Don't waste on a 10-year-old - he won't appreciate it. But adults will.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Adler

customer_reviews.title: Works great for fireplaces
customer_reviews.text: I intentionally ordered this to decorate my fireplace. I started this over Christmas and knew the Christmas wrapping paper would have to come down and wanted something neutral. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Dougans

customer_reviews.title: So nice
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, quality wrap. Modern and beautiful. The design allows you to cut in different directions to change up stripes for a cool stack up of gifts
customer_reviews.author: cory weiss

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors, but scratches extremely easily. The matte finish scratches when barely touched, and the ink comes off the paper with handling. The white and lightest color are not opaque.
customer_reviews.author: painter lady

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great colors and very high quality. The only issue I had was one of the rolls did not have a clean edge (it almost looked like it had been ripped.) I only lost a few inches off of the end so it wasn’t a huge issue, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Would like to love
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this paper, even though it’s a bit thin, but mine was defective and had a misprint deep into the roll - which I obviously couldn’t find until I was almost done with the roll and couldn’t return it. Hopefully this was just a fluke on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Eckard

customer_reviews.title: Great paper!
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper is awesome! Best quality I’ve ever used. Thick paper but easy to fold and use. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Hutch5785

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper is beautiful and versatile! I love the stripes because you can use the same paper to make gifts look different. I am using the 3 rolls and assigning each member of my family a distinctive paper. I also love that you can use this paper any time of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra Johnson

customer_reviews.title: What a Find!
customer_reviews.text: This paper is gorgeous! Better yet, it's thick enough to not rip easily, but thin enough to fold easily. I don't really care about getting compliments, but my gifts have gotten them anyway. But don't just check out Just Like Ruby's products; check the web site as well. It's inspirational and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Retha Lee Wright

customer_reviews.title: Overall great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Overall great quality product, great weight of paper for wrapping (no tears or rips, not too thick, no transparency) and for a great price! Only minor noticeable flaw (to me personally) would be having no grids on the inside of the paper roll. But that’s it! Still give it 5 stars. *Pictures taken indoors, and having only used the striped paper thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Reding

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and high quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this paper! Awesome design, fabulous quality and something different than regular old wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: This paper is nice and thick. It makes a nice presentation. A little pricey, but overall very pleased..
customer_reviews.author: dawn r. curtsinger

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worth money
customer_reviews.text: At first I was so happy with it and love the way it looked then I started wrapping packages... it’s very hard to fold which you’d think would make it thick but you can see right through the white parts on the paper to the present. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Urmston

customer_reviews.title: Best wrapping paper ever
customer_reviews.text: Best wrapping paper ever! I will never buy a different type again. It's luxurious, easy to use, beautiful, sturdy and a great deal for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Medina

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Lovely paper and nice and thick. However, I wish just a bit more came on each roll. It’s a bit much for the price to not have enough when wrapping gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Koral Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: The colors and thickness was better than I expected. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Really Pretty Paper!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you need non-Christmas paper and it can be tough to find. These Just like Ruby papers are beautifully-designed and sure to be complimented before being ripped to shreds!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper was excellent quality and the colors were very vibrant. I went to a bridal shower and there were over 100 gifts, my wrapping truly was the most beautiful,so many people raved about it. I will by Just like Ruby wrapping paper again!
customer_reviews.author: Lizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect presents 👌
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and excellent quality - they have a nice thickness that is still pliable enough to easily wrap and stay held with regular tape. The soft, sophisticated color palette make these the perfect stash for any occasion & make a lovely presentation for any gift. My go-to from now on. 👌
customer_reviews.author: Charltons

customer_reviews.title: This is possibly the most stunning (and strong) wrapping paper ...
customer_reviews.text: This is possibly the most stunning (and strong) wrapping paper I have ever bought! And, there is loads of it! Highest quality!
customer_reviews.author: N. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is the second year in a row I’ve ordered this exact paper. I love it ! It looks so beautiful and the quality of the paper makes gift wrapping so much easier. It’s sturdy and so easy to work with. I had left over from last year and plan on keeping a supply for myself for presents through out the year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang for the buck. Well made, beautiful colors. For my wife.
customer_reviews.text: Like buying brand name wrapping paper. Hello Tiffany or Kate spade colors at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: BookWormInternational

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous wrapping paper. Really good quality. You could put this in a nice frame as artwork.
customer_reviews.author: BellaCoco

customer_reviews.title: Formal Colors
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t as thick as most single packed wrapping papers, but it definitely makes your gift look formal.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Simply lovely. A nice bright pop of color that feels hip and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Tahlia Merrill Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely paper!!! Used it to decorate our apartment door and I loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Spearman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but
customer_reviews.text: There’s not much paper on each role and the matte one wrinkles a lot, so should only be used for a perfectly straight edges package
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is really pretty. I bought it for a wedding gift.
customer_reviews.author: ColorMeNanny

customer_reviews.title: I like the wrapping paper so colorful but most of all ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the wrapping paper so colorful but most of all I like that it also gave me a little history of Just like Ruby that was very different it got my brain just thinking about my life and I know my woman will enjoy the gifts behind this creative wrapping paper
customer_reviews.author: Maci G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, elegant, and easy to wrap with!
customer_reviews.text: I look for a good value on good wrapping paper all year long because presenting my presents in a beautiful way is part of the experience for me of celebrations, especially Christmas. This is the second time I bought this brand of wrapping paper and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Aladeen

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Patterns are gorgeous. Alas, quality is not. Felt more like paper than wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Love this wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: This wrapped paper is gorgeous and elegant. It’s well made and for three large roles it’s an excellent value. It exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty paper and the quality is good. It is a little pricey for what it is, but I would likely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth F.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, but you might need to double
customer_reviews.text: Better than bargain-basement paper, but you still will need to double-up if you are wrapping something with high-contrast lettering, like a book. Slightly see-through
customer_reviews.author: J. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and exactly as described! Couldn't wait to start wrapping gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty papper
customer_reviews.text: Great wrapping paper very pretty and great quality. I felt that it was a bit pricy but over all great product
customer_reviews.author: Vyla Kong

customer_reviews.title: Smells too strong for me, but noses differ
customer_reviews.text: This paper looks as shown, but it has a chemical smell and was too strong for me. Maybe I am sensitive but it seemed stronger than that freshly printed smell you find in magazines and newspapers.
customer_reviews.author: graham

customer_reviews.title: Great product & great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This paper is very nice. It is thick and heavy duty. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: LAURING

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but shows flaws
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous paper, but had to give it 3 stars because it shows every crinkle, stain, and unflattering wrinkle in the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Ilana Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Even better IRL
customer_reviews.text: This gift wrap is so much prettier than in the pictures and the gifts turned out beautifully! I love how the colors are matte and the gold is metallic. The variation is stunning!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Havens

customer_reviews.title: Severely damaged on arrival, no protection in box whatsoever.
customer_reviews.text: $19 for wrapping paper and this is how it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Horror movie holic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy wrapping paper online. I like to see the colors and feel the paper. However, shopping is a hassle and I wanted something quickly. Ruby's wrapping paper is superior quality and the colors are vibrant- plus the package arrived in less than 48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Barentine

customer_reviews.title: Tasteful and fun
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors, the matte texture is a little easy to damage though. I have a large family and enjoyed having a matching variety for my Christmas gifts to them.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get the colors they advertise
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE the paper, but I'm pretty upset that I didn't get the teal wrapping paper. That wrapping paper was the main reason I bought this and I ended up getting 2 of the black, gold, and off white. Not too happy
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely in person
customer_reviews.text: The paper is much thicker than I expected. It still tore easily, however it is paper. Tearing is to be expected
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Cute wrapping paper! Pretty good quality. Not much in each roll but works for a couple items each.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous paper - everyone asks if I paid for professional wrap!
customer_reviews.author: Valkyrie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Unique
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and unique wrapping paper! This is my new go to brand for wrapping paper
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Bey

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase this product again
customer_reviews.text: The colors of the wrapping paper were vibrant, so beautiful and durable. I used it wrap gifts for a baby shower for my twin grandchildren. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: See-through
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper is see-through. Also, just from wrapping a gift, the paper has all kinds of dark marks on it. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic D.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t love it
customer_reviews.text: Don’t love this wrapping paper. It shows fingerprints and is not at all easy to fold resulting in crinkled corners when wrapping. It’s thick but still feels cheap. It is very cute but I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All around use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beautiful wrap because of its varied occasions. It can be used for many occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Michel

customer_reviews.title: See through rolls
customer_reviews.text: The wrapping paper is see through on 2 of the rolls sent. The only one I can't see through is the striped roll.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Love this wrapping paper! I only wish I could buy packs of just the coral/pink shaded one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The rolls came bent and the paper was very wrinkled. Pretty disappointed since I love the colors and weight of the paper. I have to discard the wrinkled portions so I’m left with half of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful in person too. Everyone was talking about this wrapping paper. (I used it for a baby shower)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: ... wrapping paper set is high quality and looks very nice. I received a lot of compliments on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The wrapping paper set is high quality and looks very nice. I received a lot of compliments on the gift wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: The paper is beauriful
customer_reviews.text: I didnt care for the gold, black, and white striped wrapping paper as much as the other 2 rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Meyer

customer_reviews.title: High quality; very luxe!
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper is fabulous! Nice thickness. The colors pop...Really bold & beautiful. Stock up!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Vanmanen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the wrapping paper. It came quickly and is very good quality. The colors are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Pretty, but not a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and classy, but not a great value in terms of amount. The colors are deep and matte which look very posh and the stock is thick enough to make good creases without being bulky. But my blue role had streaks in it and it's not a whole lot of paper for the cost. I basically used a whole roll on what I would say was a medium sized gift, that measured 1.5 ft X 1.5 ft X 2'' . If your looking for a cute paper for a specific gift, this is great. But if you want a generic paper that will last forever. Go with a bigger role.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy to fold neatly
customer_reviews.text: I wish it wasn’t silly to return this. This is terrible paper. Impossible to wrap neatly because it’s too thick and it just crumples. I’m particularly neat when it comes to wrapping so I can’t use this. Damn, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sturdy paper!
customer_reviews.text: I love this paper! Beautiful colors and is very sturdy. As a self-proclaimed terrible gift wrapper, I often tear corners on the cheaper, thin paper, but this stood up to even my clumsy fingers :) I love the mix of patterns and that the darker striped paper has more of a masculine look for my hubs birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: SUCH A PRETTY PAPER, BUT RIPS EASILY
customer_reviews.text: Initially this wrapping paper was bought about a year ago to wrap a birthday present for my best friend. And now that I’m about to wrap a present for a baby shower, I figured I’d put a review up for this product! It is such a pretty paper! Reason why I paid a little extra for it. However, it will rip so easily when you’re trying to wrap anything which I guess I expected a higher quality of paper since this was a bit on the expensive side for wrapping paper that will just be thrown away after opening. However, if you are careful and a wrapping pro. This paper might be for you! It’s aesthetically beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: A pretty bundle to bundle up your gift of joy
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase for wrapping paper. It gives you lots of options when wrapping because of the designs. Just as in the picture, its three different rolls each with its own design. Its very easy to cut and also crush so if you are not so particular or work neat, you may end up with a lot of creases on your gift. I did this gift and posted it as an idea if you are gifting multiple things at once. The wrapping paper is great for adult occassions such as weddings and birthdays or showers.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but thin
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper looks great! I love the design, and I love how I can save these for occasion without having to commit to a specific holiday's wrapping paper. It cuts well, so it's easy to just run the scissors along and it will cut without ripping. My main issue with this wrapping paper is that some of the colors are SEE THROUGH! I haven't decided whether I want to wrap another layer, or just let the gift content be seen. I love the design, but after going through these rolls, I will probably change to a different wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty But You Need To Be Gentle
customer_reviews.text: The paper is really cute and looks really nice! The only thing is that it's hard to keep it looking nice. The material isn't glossy like standard wrapping paper and if it comes in contact with anything rough or any uneven surface, it will leave a mark on the wrapping paper's print. So if it's not kept surrounded by bubble wrap or towels, it will get a bit scuffed up from moving it around. It's also a bit hard to fold and wrap because the paper is very thick and stiff.
customer_reviews.author: MissScarIet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy design with a great company message
customer_reviews.text: It’s very evident from the pictures that this wrapping paper is very attractive and versatile for any occasion. The pictures definitely live up to the real thing not to mention the paper is very high quality and thick. (I also loved the company message- it’s named after the founder’s grandma and based on the special message that it’s more important to give than to get. I found this mantra a really sweet touch!)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Davison

customer_reviews.title: Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: I needed to wrap some birthday gifts for my niece Hortense and someone suggested this product. It's paper, but a little thicker. It's also very colorful. You wrap up the gift in this paper so the recipient is surprised. Who knew? What a wonderful invention. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Honey

customer_reviews.title: Great but damaged due to poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Really like the weight of the paper. Colors were perfect. This paper came unprotected and just thrown in the box. The box came pretty banged up, yes your guessed it. The paper was damaged. Had to use it no time to get new paper. A lil embrassing at my soon to be daughter in laws bridal shower but I had to suck it up!
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: This is good quality thick wrapping paper that actually holds up and ...
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this again. This is good quality thick wrapping paper that actually holds up and doesn't shred when sliding scissors through it. It's very pretty also. I adorned the wrapped gifts with gold glitter letter stickers to match the trim color, and it looked super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is thick, high quality wrapping paper. Well worth the price. The larger block paper is versatile in that you have a choice of color combinations.
customer_reviews.author: jatnj

customer_reviews.title: Unique Quality Paper with Purpose
customer_reviews.text: I really like this paper. It’s nice and thick and cuts easily without shredding the edges. Covers packages nicely without extra paper. You can use it anytime of year for a variety of occasions. We enjoyed using it this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Fir Tree

customer_reviews.title: Quality and beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this paper! It’s definitely quality, sturdy without being thick, amazing colors and color combinations! I’ve learned that the wrapping is as important as the gift and this paper is a perfect start.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cheap. It rips easily and see through. It made me so mad that I couldn’t wrap up something so easy. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Colors, Quality, Metallic Shine!
customer_reviews.text: Nice color variety with metallic stripes, good price. Paper thickness is medium/light...I would've preferred a somewhat thicker gauge for sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, pricey wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: This is very, very high quality wrapping paper, and it is a major step up from my usual $3 Target buys. This will not rip easily, it folds nicely, and the colors are vibrant. I probably wouldn't pay this much for wrapping paper again, but I do love having it.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Great wrapping paper. Felt creamy to touch - make sure to wash your hands ahead of time so that you don't get skin oils on it - it is a little sensitive to that because of the matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous paper
customer_reviews.text: Very generous rolls. I've used them multiple times and am nowhere near through the order. Nice heavy paper, cuts great, wraps beautifully. And waaaaaay cheaper than Container Store or similar. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: CarlaK

customer_reviews.title: Thick, quality paper with striking colors
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to wrap a bridal shower gift. The paper is nice and thick, the colors are beautiful (even the bride-to-be said “Oh, what pretty paper!” I did have an issue with the item I received, so I contacted the company. The owner promptly responded and worked with me to make it make things right. I would definitely order more products from them again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kazacos

customer_reviews.title: Super chic wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: These are GORGEOUS. So chic looking, especially when you wrap multiple gifts and use a mix of patterns. Really happy with the purchase, even though I don't usually spend a lot on wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.author: Emma DelVecchio

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday day. The paper is sturdy. I love the way it wraps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Quality wrapping paper 🎉
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about you and your paper! Thank you for your creativity and the beauty of the product. The notes are an unexpected treasure.
customer_reviews.author: ladyedith

customer_reviews.title: Thick paper
customer_reviews.text: The paper is a bit thick making it harder to wrap odd shapes. But it does the job and looks nice if you don't wrinkle it
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Salvadorini

product_meta.title: WRAPAHOLIC Gift Wrapping Paper Roll for All Occasions, Regular - 9.8 Feet, 3 Count
product_meta.description: Gold print. This wrapping paper roll is the perfect gift wrap for any occasion in which elegance matters. Be beautiful!
feature_bullets: Gold print. This wrapping paper roll is the perfect gift wrap for any occasion in which elegance matters. Be beautiful!
Premium quality. Weight matters with paper wrapping paper. The designer paper is high quality and meant for easy gift coverage; will not TEAR or rip while wrapping!
Stripes. We took stripes to another level! Brilliant colors are separated by the premium Gold print. Colors are matte and gold print is shiny!

All occasion. This premium paper works for any holiday present that needs to be wrapped! First birthday wrapping paper bundle. An assortment of different looks can be created which makes it ideal for the whole family.
New Longer Rolls! 3 premium Rolls are 30" Wide x 118" Long. That is 24.5 square feet per roll and 73.5 square feet per set!
